des: "For cakes. I personally like a 1 1/2 batch! Frost cake immediately to keep frosting from setting."
ins: Stir sugar, cocoa powder, butter, and 7 tablespoons milk together in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Cook, stirring constantly, at a boil for 2 minutes. Remove immediately and put saucepan in a sink with 1 inch cold water in it to cool the frosting. Add remaining milk and vanilla extract to the frosting; stir until thick.
